item.Q:
Write the character:
(adverb of degree); quite; very; awfully
item.A: hěn

traditional: 嗎
1: ma 2: mǎ
吗啡 (嗎啡) mafēi joy-powder 吗啡 (嗎啡) mǎfēi morphine

guǒ
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

traditional: 謝
xiè
感谢 (感謝) gǎnxiè (express) thanks; gratitude; grateful; thankful; thanks

item.Q:
Write the character:
dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said
item.A:
traditional: 話
huà
的话 (的話) dehuà if

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: abbr. for China; magnificent; splendid; flowery
2: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi; surname
item.A:
traditional: 華
1: huá 2: Huà
新华社 (新華社) Xīnhuáshè Xinhua news agency 华山 (華山) Huàshān Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳

gāo
提高 tígāo raise; increase

tā
她们 (她們) tāmen they

item.Q:
Write the character:
to add; plus; abbr. for Canada 加拿大
item.A:
jīa
增加 zēngjīa to raise; to increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
prefix used before the surname a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person)
item.A:
lǎo
老人 lǎorén old people; the aged
